page.title: 11ALLOTMENTS
page.content: There are 51 allotments near our school.Each one has a hut and some have a greenhouse too.There are a few taps so that the people can water their plants and vegetables.Some people keep chickens,for their eggs and pigeons,for racing,on their allotment. My dad's allotment was passed down from members of my dad's family.Our greenhouse isn't very large but inside there is a woodwork bench.We have grown lettuces and tomatoes in it.On the rest of the allotment we have grown onions,cauliflowers,cabbage, beetroot,red cabbage and many other vegetables.My dad spends most of his weekends at the allotments and some weekday mornings as well.
